text: Air Buddies is the 6th movie in the Air Bud movie series. It is also the first movie in the Air Buddies movie series. It was released in 2006 by Walt Disney Home Entertainment. The movie was directed by Robert Vince. ==Other websites== * The Official Disney Air Buddies Website * * Air Buddies DVD Review Category:2006 comedy movies Category:2000s sports comedy movies Category:American sports comedy movies Category:Movies about dogs Category:Disney movies Category:English-language movies
title: Air Buddies
